channel.title: GitHub GDScript Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of GDScript in GitHub

item.title: Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
item.description: Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

item.title: RodZill4/material-maker
item.description: A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

item.title: bitwes/Gut
item.description: Godot Unit Test. Unit testing tool for Godot Game Engine.

item.title: dialogic-godot/dialogic
item.description: üí¨ Create Dialogs, Visual Novels, RPGs, and manage Characters with Godot to create your Game!

item.title: nathanhoad/godot_dialogue_manager
item.description: A powerful nonlinear dialogue system for Godot

item.title: HungryProton/scatter
item.description: Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

item.title: gdquest-demos/godot-shaders
item.description: A large library of free and open-source shaders for the Godot game engine. Here, you'll get 2D and 3D shaders with playable demos.

item.title: MewPurPur/GodSVG
item.description: A vector graphics application for structured SVG editing, available on all major desktop platforms and on web. Currently in late alpha.

item.title: mbrlabs/Lorien
item.description: Infinite canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Made with Godot.

item.title: bitbrain/beehave
item.description: üêù behavior tree AI for Godot Engine

item.title: GDQuest/learn-gdscript
item.description: Learn Godot's GDScript programming language from zero, right in your browser, for free.

item.title: Quaint-Studios/Reia
item.description: RPG game action-adventure MMO built with Godot and Rust.

item.title: foxssake/netfox
item.description: Addons for building multiplayer games with Godot

item.title: Maaack/Godot-Game-Template
item.description: Godot template with a main menu, options menus, pause menu, credits, scene loader, extra tools, and an example game scene.

item.title: ramokz/phantom-camera
item.description: üëªüé• Control the movement and dynamically tween 2D & 3D cameras. Built for Godot 4. Inspired by Cinemachine.
